mapper.select: select * from 1to1document as m where m.Title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
select * from 1to1document as m where m.Authors like concat('%',#{author},'%')
select * from 1to1document as m where m.Publication_Year=#{year}
select * from 1to1document as m where m.Affiliations like concat('%',#{affiliation},'%');
select * from 1to1document as m where concat(m.Author_Keywords,",",m.IEEE_terms,",",m.INSPEC_controlled,",",m.INSPEC_noncontrolled) like concat('%',#{keyword},'%');

select * from 1to1document as t where t.Authors like concat('%',#{AuthorName},'%') and t.Affiliations like concat('%',#{Affiliation},'%') and t.Publication_Year like concat('%',#{PublicationYear},'%') and (t.Author_Keywords like concat('%',#{Keywords},'%') or t.Author_Keywords is NULL) order by Publication_Year desc
select * from documentinfo as t where t.DOI like concat('%',#{doi},'%')
select * from documentinfo as t where t.`Reference count` >87 order by `Reference Count` desc
select * from 1to1document as m where m.DOI=#{DOI}

select count(*) from (select * from 1to1document as t where t.affiliation_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%') or t.affiliation_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.affiliation_id=#{id}) as m where m.Publication_Year=#{year}
select count(*) from (select * from 1to1document as t where t.author_id like concat('%;',#{id},';%') or t.author_id like concat(#{id},';%') or t.author_id=#{id}) as m where m.Publication_Year=#{year}
select count(*) from 1to1document as t where t.Author_KeyWords like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and t.Publication_Year=#{year}
select t.DOI from 1to1document as t left join documentinfo as t1 on t.DOI=t1.DOI where t.affiliation_id=#{id} order by `Reference Count` desc limit 10
select * from 1to1document as t where t.affiliation_id like concat('%',#{id},',%') or t.affiliation_id like concat('%,',#{id},'%') or t.affiliation_id=#{id}
select * from 1to1document as m where m.Author_KeyWords like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
